d:
An ongoing project of mine, started back in late 2023 with weekly updates ever since.
The weird jump in quality at the start is caused by me updating the first 4 pages back in 2025.

All of the images are AI generated, with a lot of editing and splicing things together, and occasional drawn effects and details.

It's very light on the NSFW as I'm mainly in it for the story and the mental struggles. Some NSFW pages are available on patreon though, but will go public after the comic is complete.

It is not my intention to paywall anything, but your patience.
If you have none or just want to see more stuff (including some non-generated but drawn things!), or just want to throw some money my way, please visit

patreon.com/IsekaiMeSenpai
deviantart.com/isekaimesenpai

I am not going to be spamming updates to this gallery weekly, so if you want to keep up with the story live, you can also visit

https://ims-comics.com/

Thanks!

This is my first time uploading anything to this site, so let me know if I messed something up.
n: [Misc] That Time I Got NPCed (Ongoing) [AI Generated]
